title: Error: Install Rust Lang on the WLS
body:
I tried this code: ```rust > curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh info: profile set to 'default' info: default host triple is x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu info: syncing channel updates for 'stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu' info: latest update on 2020-04-23, rust version 1.43.0 (4fb7144ed 2020-04-20) info: downloading component 'cargo' info: downloading component 'clippy' info: downloading component 'rust-docs' info: downloading component 'rust-std' info: downloading component 'rustc' info: downloading component 'rustfmt' info: installing component 'cargo' thread 'main' panicked at 'assertion failed: `(left == right)` left: `22`, right: `4`', src/libstd/sys/unix/thread.rs:166:21 ``` I expected to see this happen: *explanation* Instead, this happened: *explanation* ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` latest ``` ` cat /etc/issue`: ``` Ubuntu 20.04 LTS ```
Backtrace

``` stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f60cfcdbc9c - backtrace::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h65597d255cb1398b at /cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/backtrace-0.3.40/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:88 1: 0x7f60cfcdbc9c - backtrace::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized::hd4f479d7150ec4a0 at /cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/backtrace-0.3.40/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66 2: 0x7f60cfcdbc9c - std::sys_common::backtrace::_print_fmt::h015072984a2b172c at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:77 3: 0x7f60cfcdbc9c - ::fmt::h6df05d3335f32194 at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:61 4: 0x7f60cf9ba81c - core::fmt::write::h1f444f4312eb6c27 at src/libcore/fmt/mod.rs:1028 5: 0x7f60cfcdb526 - std::io::Write::write_fmt::h8d147888220078ef at src/libstd/io/mod.rs:1412 6: 0x7f60cfcdb19e - std::sys_common::backtrace::_print::h8a6df0fa81d6af62 at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:65 7: 0x7f60cfcdb19e - std::sys_common::backtrace::print::h6f05b4733407e509 at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:50 8: 0x7f60cfcdb19e - std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}::h0d0a23bd02315dd8 at src/libstd/panicking.rs:188 9: 0x7f60cfcda943 - std::panicking::default_hook::h8d15a9aecb4efac6 at src/libstd/panicking.rs:205 10: 0x7f60cfcda943 - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::hbe174577402a475d at src/libstd/panicking.rs:464 11: 0x7f60cfcda4be - std::panicking::continue_panic_fmt::h4d855dad868accf3 at src/libstd/panicking.rs:373 12: 0x7f60cfcda450 - std::panicking::begin_panic_fmt::ha0f013e3301a9528 at src/libstd/panicking.rs:328 13: 0x7f60cfcaae86 - ::join::hf33124263a81d2a4 14: 0x7f60cfc9cd40 - rustup::dist::component::package::unpack_without_first_dir::h352b57d236248e9a 15: 0x7f60cfc762f6 - rustup::dist::manifestation::Manifestation::update::h8c800deec8167b5b 16: 0x7f60cfc64b8a - rustup::dist::dist::try_update_from_dist_::h113375517e7a85ca 17: 0x7f60cfc4964c - rustup::toolchain::Toolchain::install::h048b51ffab245b48 18: 0x7f60cfc46c8c - rustup_init::main::hba9a23e308c96901 22: 0x7f60cf8b7a03 - std::rt::lang_start::{{closure}}::h1778d9ce6385bef5 23: 0x7f60cf92c458 - main 24: 0x7f60cf4070b3 - __libc_start_main 25: 0x7f60cf8b4029 - info: rolling back changes ```
